snippet.title: PROJECT PARASITE - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on an unforgettable journey with "Parasite," a third-person sci-fi adventure game brought to you by Actios. This compact yet rich gaming experience will transport you to a desolate space station where you, as a robot, are entrusted with a mission of utmost importance - restoring a failing power plant.


📆 Availabe now! 👉 https://store.epicgames.com/de/p/project-parasite-d26478


🎮 Play on PC and Mac.


For more information and updates, visit:
🔗 https://actios.de/parasite 
🔗 https://store.epicgames.com/de/p/project-parasite-d26478


📣 Join the conversation using #parasite and #actios.
